colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022A *, ,(CES PHUG LUGS KYI RTZIS KYI LEGS BSHAD MKHAS PA'I MGUL RGYAN DO SHAL DPYOD LDAN SNYING NOR LAS, GSHIN RTZIS CUNG ZAD SPROS 'DO NI NYAM PHRA ZHING LHUN PO DON GRUB DBANG @022B RGYAL GYI NAG PAR RTZIS DBYINGS SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU 'GRAN PA'I ZLA BRAL LTA BU YIG CHA DANG GONG MA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I, GSHIN RTZIS KYI YIG CHA MANG PO NANG NAS KHYUNG NAG SH'AKYA KA RA'I MDZAD PA'I GSHIN RTZIS 'DI NI HA CAN DGOS PA YIN 'DUG KYANG, GZHAN YANG PHAN CHEN SMON 'GRO BA'I DPE CHA RGYUN DUS 'CHI MED BDE BA'I GSHIN RTZIS BSKOR DANG BSTUN LA RANG NYID KYI RIG PAS DPYAD DE, THANG TSIG BCOS THABS SOGS CUNG ZAD GSAL BAR BYAS LA, SPYI BA'I DON BCU GSUM PA SOGS BSDUS SHING DON TSANG BAS 'CHOL DANG, DUR BTAB LAS GZHAN NI TSOGS PAR GYIS PA'I KYANG 'GRO BA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI 'CHI BA MED PA'I TSE YI RIGS 'DZIN THOB PA DANG, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS GNAS SKABS SU THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , BKRA SHIS DANG @023A *, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
